Package academy.mindswap.ServerElements.GameElements.PlayerCharacters

Class Character

java.lang.Object
academy.mindswap.ServerElements.GameElements.PlayerCharacters.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attackable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Knight, Mage, Squire
public abstract class Character extends Object implements Attackable
This class represents the common attributes and actions for all player's character in the game
